title: The incentive FSI permissible under this Regulation against BUA of the PPL, shall be 50% of the BUA
clause_text: The incentive FSI permissible under this Regulation against BUA of the PPL, shall be 50% of the BUA of the PPL, such that the total permissible FSI including the incentive FSI under this Regulation does not exceed as detailed below: -
section: 33(18) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lots (PPL):
